articles.author: Matt Kew
articles.title: F1 drivers pushing FIA for fourth Singapore DRS zone - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Formula 1 drivers are lobbying the FIA to add a fourth DRS zone to the 2023 Singapore Grand Prix lap amid concerns that track layout changes will not boost overtaking.
articles.content:
Due to construction work around Marina Bay, the characteristic 90-degree corners that previously made up Turns 16-19 have been replaced by a kinked back straight.
Despite the curve, drivers were sti… [+2046 chars]

articles.author: Matt Roller
articles.title: Jason Roy loses his England ODI record; will it be his World Cup place next? - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Batter can only wait and hope after back spasm keeps him on sidelines during Stokes onslaught
articles.content: Jason Roy's place in England's World Cup squad is not yet nailed on  •  Gareth Copley/ECB/Getty Images
